00021 inline Cell* make_int(int i)
00022 {
00023   Cell* my_cell = (Cell*) malloc(sizeof(Cell));
00024   my_cell->tag_m = type_int;
00025   my_cell->int_m = i;
00026   return my_cell;
00027 }

00037   my_cell->double_m = d;

00045 inline Cell* make_symbol(const char* s)
00046 {
00047   Cell* my_cell = (Cell*) malloc(sizeof(Cell));
00048   my_cell->tag_m = type_symbol;
00049   my_cell->symbol_m =(char*) malloc(strlen(s)+1);
00050   strcpy(my_cell->symbol_m,s);
00051   return my_cell;
00052 }

00060 inline Node* make_node(Cell* my_elem, Node* my_next)
00061 {
00062   Node* my_node = (Node*)malloc(sizeof(Node));
00063   my_node->elem_m = my_elem;
00064   my_node->next_m = my_next;
00065   return my_node;
00066 }

00072 inline bool intp(const Cell* c)
00073 {
00074   return c ? c->tag_m == type_int : false;
00075 }
00076 
00081 inline bool doublep(const Cell* c)
00082 {
00083   return c ?  c->tag_m == type_double : false;
00084 }
00085 
00090 inline bool symbolp(const Cell* c)
00091 {
00092   return c ? c->tag_m == type_symbol : false;
00093 }

00099 inline int get_int(const Cell* c)
00100 {
00101   if (intp(c)){
00102     return c->int_m;
00103   } else {
00104     //print out error
00105     std::cerr << "ERROR" <<std::endl;
00106     exit(1);
00107   }
00108 }
00109 
00114 inline double get_double(const Cell* c)

00117     return c->double_m;
00118   } else {
00119     //print out error
00120     std::cerr << "ERROR" <<std::endl;
00121     exit(1);

00145 inline Cell* get_elem(const Node* n)
00146 {
00147   //make sure passed in n points to a valid Node*
00148   return n ? n->elem_m : (Cell*)NULL;
00149 }
00150 
00155 inline Node* get_next(const Node* n)
00156 {
00157   return n ? n->next_m : (Node*)NULL;
00158 }

00165 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Node& n)
00166 {
00167   const Node* p = &n;
00168   //print the opening paren
00169   os << "(";
00170 
00171   //an "infinite loop" printing each node
00172   //break upon end
00173   while(p) {
00174     
00175     if (intp(get_elem(p))) {
00176       os<<get_int(get_elem(p));
00177     } else if (doublep(get_elem(p))){
00178       os<<get_double(get_elem(p));
00179     } else if (symbolp(get_elem(p))){
00180       os<<get_symbol(get_elem(p));
00181     }
00182     
00183     //move to the next node if exsits
00184     //otherwise break the loop
00185     if (get_next(p)) {
00186       //remeber to print a space
00187       os << " ";
00188       p = get_next(p);
00189     } else break;
00190   }
00191 
00192   //print the closing paren
00193   os << ")";
00194   
00195   return os;
00196 }
